title.narrative: Water Supply and Sanitation Services Investment Program - Tranche 2

description.narrative: The Project will rehabilitate and expand the water supply and wastewater management systems in Andijan and Kokand cities and water supply systems in Fergana, Margilan, and Rishtan cities, which are priorities for development. Its impact will be improved public health and hygiene in Andijan, Fergana, Kokand, Margilan and Rishtan cities. The outcome will be safe, reliable, and sustainable WSS services and improved hygiene for 1.4 million people by 2025.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Increase hours of availability of water supply from 2 hrs in 2010 to at least 20 hrs by 2015

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: More than 70% of wastewater in Andijan and Kokand cities collected and treated by 2015 from 35% in 2009

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: Time spent by women and children to fetch water reduced from current 4 days/month in 2010 to less than 1 day/month in the project area by 2015

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: System leakage reduced from 50% in 2009 to less than 30% by 2015

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: Increase provision of safe, reliable water to 1.1 million people by 2015 or 95% of the population from 80% in 2009

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.

title.narrative: Water quality complies with national drinking water standards from 2015 onward

description.narrative: Safe, reliable, and sustainable water supply and sanitation services and improved hygiene in project cities.
